title: Windows 8.1 Pro VL X64 MULTI6 IE11 ESD Feb2014
description:
Windows 8.1 Pro VL X64 MULTI6 IE11 ESD Feb2014 


[ RELEASE INFO ]

  File:		W81.PRO.X64.MULTI6.ESD.Feb2014.iso
 
  Source:	en_windows_8_1_pro_vl_x64_dvd_2971948
 
  Size: 	3,67GB
  Format: 	Bootable ISO
   
  CRC32: 	af021d7b
  MD5:		786430bfb9ab502d5fe0a15d56ba250d
  SHA-1: 	aed91afc4d428c02af46082f761db4514a81aae3


[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  * Windows 8 Pro VL 


[ Features ]
  
  * install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
    which reduces the size. 


[ NOTE ]
 
  * Only clean installs can be made with this format, not upgrades.


[ Languages ]

  * de-DE  [German]  
  * en-US  [English]
  * es-ES  [Spanish]   
  * fr-FR  [French]
  * it-IT  [Italian]
  * pt-BR  [Brazilian Portuguese]
 
   
[ CONTENTS ]

  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:
  * .NET 2.0
  * .NET 3.5
  * Hotfixes - 2014-02-11

 
  Setupcomplete / Post-install:
  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

  Activation & application information:
  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
  * All optional applications except 7-Zip and WinRAR uses web installers
    which requires connection to internet.
  * To skip activation and optional applications, just click on "Exit".   
  * To Pre-Activate Windows, select "Activation".
  * Choose any application. 
  * Click on "Begin Install" to execute your choices.


  Optional software 
  * 7-zip 9.22
  * Adobe Reader
  * Adobe Flashplayer
  * DirectX
  * Mozilla Firefox
  * WinRAR 5.01

    
[ Installation ]

  * Create bootable USB (highly recommended), minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or burn to DVD at slow speed.
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
